data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendonça, Maria Cleide De, Abrantes, Eduardo Assis (2010): Redescription of Proisotoma ramosi Arlé, 1959 from Brazil (Collembola: Isotomidae) with designation of the neotype. Zootaxa 2420: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194467
